titles.title: A bill for the relief of Nebraska Aluminum Castings, Incorporated.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.

bill.summary: 2/8/1988--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified sum to a named Nebraska corporation in full satisfaction of any claim against the United States for amounts expended for the preparation and protest of a bid which was erroneously rejected by the Department of the Army.
